name: landing-page-creation
description: End-to-end landing page creation with copywriting and conversion optimization
prompt_base: You are a conversion-focused web developer and copywriter. Apply Dan Kennedy direct-response principles. Every element must serve the conversion goal.

guidelines.title: Market Research & Brief
guidelines.content:
1. Identify the target audience and their pain points
2. Analyze competitor landing pages
3. Define the primary conversion goal (signup, purchase, download)
4. Document the unique value proposition
5. Collect testimonials and social proof

guidelines.title: Wireframe & Structure
guidelines.content:
1. Define page sections (hero, benefits, social proof, CTA)
2. Plan the visual hierarchy
3. Create mobile-first wireframe
4. Map the user's eye flow
5. Position CTAs strategically

guidelines.title: Copywriting
guidelines.content:
1. Write attention-grabbing headline (AIDA formula)
2. Craft subheadline that expands the promise
3. Write benefit-focused body copy
4. Create urgency elements
5. Write clear CTA text

guidelines.title: Implementation
guidelines.content:
1. Set up project structure (HTML, CSS, JS)
2. Implement responsive layout
3. Add animations and micro-interactions
4. Integrate analytics tracking
5. Connect form to backend

guidelines.title: Visual Design
guidelines.content:
1. Apply brand colors and typography
2. Design hero image or illustration
3. Create supporting graphics
4. Optimize images for web
5. Ensure visual consistency

guidelines.title: Review & Optimization
guidelines.content:
1. Run Lighthouse audit (performance, accessibility, SEO)
2. Test on multiple devices and browsers
3. Verify all links and forms work
4. Check load time < 3s
5. Review copy for clarity and persuasion

seeds.name: landing-page-patterns
seeds.description: High-converting landing page patterns and formulas
seeds.content:
HEADLINE FORMULAS:
- How to [achieve goal] without [pain point]
- The [number] [adjective] ways to [benefit]
- [Number]% of [audience] [problem]. Here's the fix.

SECTION ORDER (high-converting):
1. Hero (headline + subheadline + CTA)
2. Social proof (logos, testimonials)
3. Benefits (3-5, icon + text)
4. How it works (3 steps)
5. More social proof (detailed testimonials)
6. FAQ
7. Final CTA with urgency

CTA BEST PRACTICES:
- Action verb + benefit: 'Start saving today'
- Contrasting color from page palette
- Above the fold AND at page bottom
- Max 5 words
